mapper.select: SELECT c.ceo_id ceoId, c.subscription_no subscriptionNo FROM ceo c LEFT JOIN join_ceo jc ON c.ceo_id = jc.ceo_id WHERE jc.active = '승인' AND (c.subscription_no = 2 OR c.subscription_no = 3)
